CONCLUSION: No violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Article 6-1 - Fair hearing;Equality of arms)

NORP In DATE a similar claim under LAW was brought by PERSON She submitted that the applicant had been under an obligation to pay her maintenance and that he owed her LTL CARDINAL ( approximately ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL ) . The applicant argued that he had renounced his part of the inheritance for the benefit of his sister who had paid all the expenses of their mother ’s funeral .
